SELECT DISTINCT a.createdate, IFNULL(b.machinebacklognum, 0) as machineBacklogNum, IFNULL(b.machinebacklogsize, 0) as machineBacklogSize, IFNULL(b.kafkabacklognum, 0) as kafkaBacklogNum, IFNULL(b.kafkabacklogsize, 0) as kafkaBacklogSize FROM backlog as a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT createdate, sum(machinebacklognum) as machineBacklogNum, sum(machinebacklogsize) as machineBacklogSize, sum(kafkabacklognum) as kafkaBacklogNum, sum(kafkabacklogsize) as kafkaBacklogSize FROM backlog WHERE 1 = 1
GROUP BY createdate ) AS b ON a.createdate = b.createdate order by a.createdate;
